item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 1:15 PM UTC
item.description:

7. In Zig, what's a writer? (64 points | 25 comments)

13. Blogging on Paper (13 points | 5 comments)

25. Scientists find links between Alzheimer's, herpes, and head trauma (144 points | 55 comments)
26. The Severance writer and cast on corporate cults, sci-fi, and more (43 points | 28 comments)
27. Zusie – My Relay Computer (121 points | 31 comments)

29. Better Know a Ruby Thing: Singleton Classes (116 points | 21 comments)
